bibl.title: A Greek Grammar and a Graeco-Latin Lexicon on St. Paul (Rom., 2 Cor., Gal., Eph.). A Note on E.A. Lowe, C.L.A., Supplement No. 1683.
bibl.note: Dublin, Chester Beatty Library. Sans No. d'Inv. (Accession No. 1499). Cf. Idem, An Unedited Grammatical and Lexicographical Papyrus Codex in Dublin, AncSoc 3 (1972) pp. 259-262.
Wouters Alfons P., A Greek Grammar and a Graeco-Latin Lexicon on St. Paul (Rom., 2 Cor., Gal., Eph.). A Note on E.A. Lowe, C.L.A., Supplement No. 1683.
